channel.title: Good 317?[edit] read pleas
channel.description:
ok i am currently using tragedy pk source and its not working out i get 7+players on and clients start getting buggy and freezing.
so i am in need of a new source and client ive been looking throiugh the downloads but i cannot pick one out. really all i am looking for is one that can host at least 100 players and i will be able to code everything i want from there. i would love to go back to delta coding but im sure idk but i think all deltas have the comb at delay were you attack something or somebody and it takes like a 5 second delay then it attacks. so does anybody know a good 317 thats been released that can host at least 100 players and has little to no bugs dupes glitches etc?
what client would be a good one to use for hyperion?

item.title: Good 317?[edit] read pleas
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

yea i read alot about it on the release here. i found project annihilation and it looks good.
however i dont believe i have the experiece to code a server from just a base with player rendering and just basic stuff. i downloaded pja and i can even get it to run lol:/
i get this

Nov 27, 2010 4:06:38 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:39 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:40 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:40 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:40 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Nov 27, 2010 4:06:41 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:42 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:42 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:52 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Nov 27, 2010 4:06:52 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Nov 27, 2010 4:06:52 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio n: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
im guessing it loads good untill loading definitions i guess idk. can somebody fix this?

Read full topic
